info.title: plenigo API v3
info.description:
This is the OpenAPI description for accessing the plenigo platform.
All API calls are by default synchronous. Asynchronous calls are marked.

tags.name: Backend User Session
tags.description: Required Access-Right: no token needed in header, but as requestBody

get.description: Search all access rights that correspond to the given search conditions.

400.description: Request is not formatted correctly or contains invalid data.

401.description: Plenigo api token provided is not valid or doesn't have necessary rights to access this method.

429.description: The rate limit for this endpoint is reached. Please try again later.

500.description: Currently we are not able to answer your request but we are working hard to resolve this problem.

504.description: Processing of your request took to long. To prevent blocking we aborted the request. You can resend your request without any changes.

get.description:
Search all customers that correspond to the given search conditions. It is important to note that email, username, and
externalSystemid exclude each other so only one query parameter is used. The defined priority is email, username, externalSystemId.

400.description: Request is not formatted correctly or contains invalid data.

401.description: Plenigo api token provided is not valid or doesn't have necessary rights to access this method.

plenigoToken.name: X-plenigo-token
plenigoToken.description:
To access functions from the public API a valid plenigo token must be provided as header.

API access tokens can be created and managed in the menu item Settings > Development > API Access Token.

For more details about API access tokens, visit [about plenigo API tokens](https://support.plenigo.com/help/en-us/94-plenigo-software/140-plenigo-api)

```
curl -i -H "X-plenigo-token: PLENIGO_TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" https://hostname/resource
```

sizeQuery.name: size
sizeQuery.description: amount of elements to return - if no size is provided or the size is not within range it will be automatically set to 5

startTimeQuery.name: startTime
startTimeQuery.description: time the entity was changed after or equal with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

endTimeQuery.name: endTime
endTimeQuery.description: time the entity was changed before or equal with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

startingAfterQuery.name: startingAfter
startingAfterQuery.description: A cursor for use in pagination. startingAfter is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with obj_foo, your subsequent call can include startingAfter=obj_foo in order to fetch the next result set.

endingBeforeQuery.name: endingBefore
endingBeforeQuery.description: A cursor for use in pagination. endingBefore is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with obj_bar, your subsequent call can include endingBefore=obj_bar in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

sortQuery.name: sort
sortQuery.description: The sort of the search, if its desc it will revert to search for a lower startingAfter

externalSystemIdQuery.name: externalSystemId
externalSystemIdQuery.description: external system id defined by third party systems

subscriptionItemIdQuery.name: subscriptionItemId
subscriptionItemIdQuery.description: unique id of the subscription item to search for

filterByInvoiceDateQuery.name: filterByInvoiceDate
filterByInvoiceDateQuery.description: flag indicating if returned list of invoiced should be filtered by invoice date

invoiceTypeQuery.name: invoiceType
invoiceTypeQuery.description: allows filtering by specific invoice type

bankAccountIdPath.name: bankAccountId
bankAccountIdPath.description: unique id of the bank account

parameters-plenigoOfferIdQuery.name: plenigoOfferId
parameters-plenigoOfferIdQuery.description: plenigo offer id of the offer

sortTreeLeafIdQuery.name: leafId
sortTreeLeafIdQuery.description: unique id of the sort tree leaf

chainIdPath.name: chainId
chainIdPath.description: unique id of the subscription chain

endingBeforeId.description: A cursor for use in pagination. endingBefore is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with obj_bar, your subsequent call can include endingBefore=obj_bar in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

startingAfterId.description: A cursor for use in pagination. startingAfter is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with obj_foo, your subsequent call can include startingAfter=obj_foo in order to fetch the next result set.

createdDate.description: time the object was created with time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 17:32:28

changedDate.description: time the object was changed with time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 17:32:28

UserType.description: type of user who performs the action

lifeTimeStart.description: date the access right will start with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

lifeTimeEnd.description: date the access right will end with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

accessTimeStart.description: time the access right will start with time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 17:32:28

accessTimeEnd.description: time the access right will end with time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 17:32:28

maxCacheDate.description: max cache date with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

data.description: Key must be a string with a maximum length of 20 characters.

blocked.description: flag indicating if access is blocked

plenigoOfferId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo offer id is provided here

plenigoProductId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo product id is provided here - can be identically to the productId

plenigoStepId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo step id is provided here

accessRightUniqueId.description: unique id of the access right this access right grants access to

itemType.description: type of this access right item

itemId.description: the id this access right belongs to

accessRightData.description: Key must be a string with a maximum length of 30 characters.

customerId.description: unique id of the customer the access right belongs to

customerBlocked.description: flag indicating if customer is blocked completely

productId.description: product identifier of the item that was purchased

transactionId.description: transaction identifier of the item that was purchased

originalTransactionId.description: for a transaction that restores a previous transaction, the transaction identifier of the original transaction - otherwise, identical to the transaction identifier

webOrderLineItemId.description: primary key for identifying subscription purchases

isTrialPeriod.description: value for this key is "true" if the customer’s subscription is currently in the free trial period, or "false" if not

isInIntroOfferPeriod.description: value for this key is "true" if the customer’s subscription is currently in an introductory price period, or "false" if not.

isUpgraded.description: flag indicating if item is an upgrade of another item

expiresDate.description: expiration date for the subscription with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

purchaseDate.description: date and time that the item was purchased with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

originalPurchaseDate.description: for a transaction that restores a previous transaction, the date of the original transaction with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

cancellationDate.description: for a transaction that was canceled by Apple customer support, the time and date of the cancellation - for an auto-renewable subscription plan that was upgraded, the time and date of the upgrade transaction with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

cancellationReason.description: for a transaction that was canceled, the reason for cancellation

receiptType.description: type of receipt generated (e.g. Production, ProductionVPP, ProductionSandbox, ProductionVPPSandbox)

adamID.description: generated by App Store Connect and used by the App Store to uniquely identify the app purchased

appItemID.description: generated by App Store Connect and used by the App Store to uniquely identify the app purchased

bundleID.description: bundle identifier for the app to which the receipt belongs

downloadID.description: unique identifier for the app download transaction

versionExternalIdentifier.description: arbitrary number that identifies a revision of your app

originalApplicationVersion.description: version of the app that the user originally purchased

receiptCreationDate.description: time the App Store generated the receipt, in the Pacific Time zone

requestDate.description: time the request to the verifyReceipt endpoint was processed and the response was generated

originalPurchaseDate.description: time of the original app purchase, in the Pacific Time zone

valid.description: flag indicating if purchase is valid

appStoreOrderId.description: id of the app store order if mapped

autoRenewing.description: whether the subscription will automatically be renewed when it reaches its current expiry time

autoResumeTimeMillis.description: time at which the subscription will be automatically resumed, in milliseconds since the Epoch - only present if the user has requested to pause the subscription

cancelReason.description: the reason why a subscription was canceled or is not auto-renewing

cancelSurveyReason.description: information provided by the user when they complete the subscription cancellation flow (cancellation reason survey)

userInputCancelReason.description: customized input cancel reason from the user. Only present when cancelReason is 0

subscriptionEndDate.description: date time the purchase was done with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 billing country/region code of the user at the time the subscription was granted

developerPayload.description: developer-specified string that contains supplemental information about an order

expiryTimeMillis.description: time at which the subscription will expire, in milliseconds since the Epoch

kind.description: kind represents a subscriptionPurchase object in the androidpublisher service

linkedPurchaseToken.description: purchase token of the originating purchase if this subscription is one of the following - 0. Re-signup of a canceled but non-lapsed subscription 1. Upgrade/downgrade from a previous subscription

orderId.description: order id of the latest recurring order associated with the purchase of the subscription

priceAmountMicros.description: price of the subscription, not including tax

priceCurrencyCode.description: ISO 4217 currency code for the subscription price

profileId.description: Google profile id of the user when the subscription was purchased

profileName.description: profile name of the user when the subscription was purchased

purchaseType.description: type of purchase of the subscription - this field is only set if this purchase was not made using the standard in-app billing flow

startTimeMillis.description: time at which the subscription was granted, in milliseconds since the Epoch

userCancellationTimeMillis.description: time at which the subscription was canceled by the user, in milliseconds since the epoch

acknowledgementState.description: acknowledgement state of the inapp product

consumptionState.description: consumption state of the inapp product

developerPayload.description: developer-specified string that contains supplemental information about an order

kind.description: kind represents a subscriptionPurchase object in the androidpublisher service

orderId.description: order id associated with the purchase of the inapp product

purchaseTimeMillis.description: time the product was purchased, in milliseconds since the epoch (Jan 1, 1970)

purchaseType.description: type of purchase of the inapp product

purchaseDate.description: date time the purchase was done with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

packageName.description: package name of the application the inapp product was sold in

valid.description: flag indicating if purchase is valid

subscription.description: flag indicating if purchase represents a subscription

purchaseToken.description: token provided to the user's device when the inapp product was purchased

appStoreOrderId.description: id of the app store order if mapped

position.description: position of the app store order item inside the app store order - creates a unique app store order item id in combination with the appStoreOrderId

deliveryCustomerId.description: id of the customer the delivery belongs to (also includes digital products)

appStoreSubscriptionId.description: unique identifier for the app store subscription that is associated with this item

accessRightUniqueId.description: unique id of the access right this order item grants access to

appStoreOrderId.description: unique identifier for the app store order

orderDate.description: date time the order was created with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

customerId.description: id of the customer the order belongs to

additionalStoreData.description: additional data of the app store

appStoreSubscriptionId.description: unique identifier for the app store subscription

chainId.description: all subscriptions that are in one chain because of some rules or cross selling share a unique chain id in the context of a company that is identically with the first subscription within the chain

customerId.description: id of the customer the subscription belongs to

startDate.description: date time the subscription started with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

endDate.description: date time the subscription ended with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

cancellationDate.description: date time the subscription was cancelled with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

status.description: date time the order was created with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

accessRightUniqueId.description: unique id of the used access right

source.description: identify the source of the traffic

medium.description: identify the medium the link was used on

campaign.description: identify a strategic campaign (e.g. product launch, new feature, partnership, etc.) or specific promotion (e.g. a sale, a giveaway, etc.)

term.description: suggested for paid search to identify keywords for your ad

content.description: suggested for additional details for A/B testing and content-targeted ads

data.description: Key must be a string with a maximum length of 30 characters.

TaxType.description: unique identification of the tax type the product represents

leitwegId.description: leitweg id used for xml invoices

username.description: selected username of the customer that is unique for all users

email.description: email address of the customer that is unique for all users

externalSystemId.description: external system id - can only be set if not set yet

salutation.description: salutation to identify the correct designation of a customer

firstName.description: first name of the customer - first name and last name or company name are required

lastName.description: last name of the customer - first name and last name or company name are required

invoiceEmail.description: email address of the customer where invoices should be sent to

language.description: language of the customer - two letter language code according to ISO 639-1

mobileNumber.description: mobile number of the customer formatted as E.164

birthday.description: birthday of the customer with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-01

termId.description: technical id of the term for relation to the merchant backend term id

uniqueId.description: unique id of the last active term

acceptanceDate.description: date time the term was accepted with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

registrationSource.description: source the user registration was started from

registrationDate.description: date the customer was registered with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

ageVerificationPinEnabled.description: flag indicating that age verification pin is set

status.description:
status of the customer

| Status      | Description                                                                                                                                               |
| ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| ACTIVATED   | customer is active and can log in and use full functionality                                                                                              |
| BLOCKED     | customer is blocked and needs to reset his password to be able to log in again                                                                            |
| DEACTIVATED | customer is deactivated and cannot log in - the customer cannot change this state by himself and a log in attempt is handled like a false password log in |
| DISABLED    | customer is disabled by plenigo and cannot be used anymore - please contact plenigo for further information (this status is currently not actively used)  |

propertyNames.description: id of the company opt in was accepted for. Key must be a string with a length of exactly 20 characters.

processingBlocked.description: Flag to indicate to third party systems that the customer is blocked for further processing and should not be used for advertisement, etc.

businessAddress.description: flag indicating if address represents a private or a business address

salutation.description: salutation to identify the correct designation of a customer

firstName.description: first name of the customer - first name and last name or company name are required

lastName.description: last name of the customer - first name and last name or company name are required

companyName.description: company name - first name and last name or company name are required

additionalCompanyInfo.description: additional information belonging to the company

country.description: country code formatted as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

vatNumber.description: VAT number of a member country of the European Union

phoneNumber.description: phone number of the customer formatted as E.164

position.description: position of the invoice item inside the invoice - creates a unique invoice item id in combination with the invoiceId

productId.description: product id - will be identical with the plenigo product id if not overwritten during checkout

plenigoOfferId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo offer id is provided here

plenigoProductId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo product id is provided here

plenigoStepId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo step id is provided here

tax.description: tax percentage operated on this invoice item

taxCountry.description: country tax is based on formatted as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

costCenter.description: cost center associated with this product at the time of invoice creation

purchaseNumber.description: purchase number associated with this subscription item

deliveryCustomerId.description: id of the customer the delivery belongs to (also includes digital products)

subscriptionItemId.description: if invoice item represents a subscription the id of the subscription item is provided here

periodStartDate.description: if invoice item represents a subscription the period start date is the start date of the invoice period

periodEndDate.description: if invoice item represents a subscription the period end date is the end date of the invoice period

orderItemId.description: if invoice item represents an order the id of the order item is provided here

discountPercentage.description: discount offered to the invoice item

invoiceId.description: unique id of the invoice in the context of a company

invoiceDate.description: invoice date time of the invoice with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

currency.description: currency of the invoice formatted as ISO 4217, alphabetic code

paymentMethod.description: payment method used to pay for the invoice

paymentMethodId.description: id of the payment method that is associated with this invoice

purchaseOrderIndicator.description: purchase invoice indicator if provided by the customer

invoiceCustomerId.description: id of the customer the invoice belongs to

transactionId.description: id of the related transaction if payment was not done via invoice

paymentChangedToBilling.description: flag indicating if invoice was created because of a failed payment process

precursorId.description: invoice id which was corrected or cancelled

successorId.description: invoice id of the corrected invoice

cancellationInvoiceId.description: invoice id of the cancellation invoice

brand.description: optional brand of the payment method

issuer.description: optional issuer of the payment method

notifyGiftee.description: flag indicating if giftee should be notified about the gift

donorText.description: personal text of the donor to the giftee

businessAddress.description: flag indicating if address represents a private or a business address

salutation.description: salutation to identify the correct designation of a customer

firstName.description: first name of the customer - first name and last name or company name are required

lastName.description: last name of the customer - first name and last name or company name are required

companyName.description: company name - first name and last name or company name are required

additionalCompanyInfo.description: additional information belonging to the company

country.description: country code formatted as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

vatNumber.description: VAT number of a member country of the European Union

phoneNumber.description: phone number of the customer formatted as E.164

voucherTemplateId.description: id fo the voucher template associated with this voucher item purchase

voucherCode.description: voucher code created with this voucher item purchase

voucherEndDate.description: validity time of voucher with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

purchaseOrderId.description: id of the order voucher was purchased with

purchaseOrderItemPosition.description: position of the order item inside the order voucher was purchased with

position.description: position of the order item inside the order - creates a unique order item id in combination with the orderId

plenigoOfferId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo offer id is provided here

plenigoProductId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo product id is provided here - can be identically to the productId

plenigoStepId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo step id is provided here

accessRightUniqueId.description: unique id of the access right this order item grants access to

title.description: product title presented to the customer

internalTitle.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the product title for internal usage is provided here

tax.description: tax percentage operated on this order item

taxCountry.description: country tax is based on formatted as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

discountPercentage.description: discount offered to the order item

costCenter.description: cost center associated with this product at the time of order creation

purchaseNumber.description: purchase number associated with this subscription item

voucherCode.description: voucher code to purchase this order item

deliveryCustomerId.description: id of the customer the delivery belongs to (also includes digital products)

subscriptionItemId.description: if order item represents a subscription the id of the subscription item is provided here

externalBilling.description: indicates if payments are handled by plenigo or an external system

taxState.description: country state used for taxes - only needed in USA and Brasil

purchasedAddonId.description: unique id of the purchased addon

validityEndDate.description: validity end date with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

orderId.description: unique id of the order in the context of a company

externalSystemId.description: if order was imported from another system this field contains the unique id of the other system

orderDate.description: order date time of the order with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

currency.description: currency of the order formatted as ISO 4217, alphabetic code

paymentMethod.description: payment method used to pay for the order (ZERO indicates a free subscription)

paymentMethodId.description: id of the payment method that is associated with this order

purchaseOrderIndicator.description: purchase order indicator if provided by the customer

invoiceCustomerId.description: id of the customer the invoice belongs to

analogInvoice.description: flag indicating if order should produce analog invoices

suppressInvoiceSending.description: flag indicating if the subscription invoice sending is suppressed

bic.description: BIC - only necessary for countries outside the EU

preferred.description: flag indicating if bank account is the preferred bank account - only one bank account can be preferred.

invalid.description: flag indicating if payment method should be handled as invalid

customerId.description: unique id of the payment mandate - if not sent plenigo will generate a new one together with a mandate date

mandateId.description: unique id of the payment mandate

mandateDate.description: date the payment mandate was created with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

bankAccountId.description: unique id of the bank account

active.description: flag indicating if bank account is active - a bank account can become inactive by getting closed, etc.

contractCompanyId.description: id of the contract company the subscription is connected to

companyId.description: id of the company the subscription is connected to

customerId.description: id of the customer the subscription is connected to

plenigoOfferId.description: the connected plenigo offer id the subscription is connected to

startPauseDate.description: date subscription pause should be start with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

endPauseDate.description: date subscription pause should be end with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

subscriptionItemId.description: unique id of the subscription item in the context of a company

plenigoProductId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo product id is provided here - can be identically to the productId

plenigoStepId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo step id is provided here

accessRightUniqueId.description: unique id of the access right this subscription item grants access to

title.description: product title presented to the customer

internalTitle.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the product title for internal usage is provided here

packageTitle.description: if subscription item is correlated to another subscription item in a way that both items are presented as one (bundle) this field contains the correlation title

packageId.description: if subscription item is correlated to another subscription item in a way that both items are presented as one (bundle) this field contains the correlation id - the id is only unique within a subscription

packageCancellationLocked.description: flag indicating if package elements can only be cancelled together

priceIssueId.description: id of the price issue the subscription item's price is based on

status.description: current status of the subscription item

costCenter.description: cost center associated with this subscription item

purchaseNumber.description: purchase number associated with this subscription item

subscriptionId.description: unique id of the subscription in the context of a company

analogInvoice.description: flag indicating if the subscription is an analog invoice

externalSystemId.description: if subscription was imported from another system this field contains the unique id of the other system

chainId.description: all subscriptions that are in one chain because of some rules or cross selling share a unique chain id in the context of a company that is identically with the first subscription within the chain

plenigoOfferId.description: if the product is based on a plenigo offer the plenigo offer id is provided here

invoiceCustomerId.description: id of the customer the invoice belongs to

invoiceAddressId.description: id of the invoice address that is associated with this subscription

deliveryCustomerId.description: id of the customer the delivery belongs to (also includes digital products)

deliveryAddressId.description: id of the delivery address that is associated with this subscription

termTimeSpan.description: represents the time span that is represented by the term

accountingPeriodTimeSpan.description: represents the time span that is represented by the accounting period

cancellationPeriodTimeSpan.description: represents the time span that is represented by the cancellation period

cancellationType.description: represents the cancellation type of the subscription

startDate.description: start date time of the subscription with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

referenceStartDate.description: reference start date time of the subscription with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

endDate.description: end date time of the subscription with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

cancellationDate.description: cancellation date time of the subscription with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

status.description:
current status of the subscription
| Status   | Description                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ---------| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ACTIVE   | subscription is active                                                                                                                                                             |                 
| INACTIVE | subscription was active and is not active anymore                                                                                                                                  |
| IGNORED  | the subscription was never active and will not be active in the future (e.g. because a previous subscription or previous step in the chain of subscriptions ended or was cancelled |

currency.description: currency of the subscription formatted as ISO 4217, alphabetic code

paymentMethod.description: payment method used to pay for the subscription (ZERO indicates a free subscription)

paymentMethodId.description: id of the payment method that is associated with this subscription

accessBlocked.description: flag indicating if subscription is blocked and delivery customer cannot access products related to subscription, for example because of payment failed

firstBookingDate.description: date the first booking was executed for this subscription with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

lastBookingDate.description: date the last booking was executed for this subscription with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

nextBookingDate.description: date the next booking is going to be executed for this subscription with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

precursorId.description: if there is another subscription preceding this subscription the id of the preceding subscription is provided here

precursorReason.description: reason for changing the subscription from the precursor

precursorReasonDetail.description: reason detail for changing the subscription from the precursor

successorId.description: if there is another subscription following up this subscription the id of the next subscription is provided here

successorReason.description: reason for changing the subscription to the successor

successorReasonDetail.description: reason detail for changing the subscription to the successor

externalBilling.description: indicates if payments are handled by plenigo or an external system

customerCancellationBlocked.description: indicates if a subscription cannot be cancelled by a customer

cancellationReasonUniqueId.description: if a subscription was cancelled and a cancellation reason was added the unique id of the cancellation reason is set here

customerCancellationReasonId.description: id of the customer cancellation reason that is associated with this subscription

durationPeriod.description: duration period of the subscription till it ends in the successor subscription

durationPeriodTimeSpan.description: represents the time span that is represented by the duration period

managedBy.description: managed by of the given subscription.

paymentTriesDone.description: amount of payment tries done in the current accounting period

subscriptionType.description: represents the type of the subscription

suppressInvoiceSending.description: flag indicating if the subscription invoice sending is suppressed

connectedOffer.description: flag indicates if a subscription is a connected offer

finishedDeliveries.description: the current amount of finished deliveries

openDeliveries.description: the current amount of open deliveries

managedExternal.description: flag indicating if subscription is managed externally

transactionId.description: unique id of the transaction also used for pagination

plenigoTransactionId.description: unique plenigo transaction id used to communicate with payment provider

transactionDate.description: date the transaction was done with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

fulfillmentDate.description: date the transaction was fulfilled with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

currency.description: currency of the transaction formatted as ISO 4217, alphabetic code

paymentProvider.description: payment provider used for transaction execution

customerId.description: unique id of the customer the transaction is related to

pspTransactionId.description: id of the payment service provider if one was provided

name.description: a name that is unique in combination with a category

description.description: internal description of the product tag

category.description: category that reflects the usage of the tag

productTagId.description: unique id of the product tag within a contract company

customerTextTmId.description: id of the customer text module to use

successorPlenigoOfferId.description: plenigo offer id of the successor

imageType.description: type of the image - there can only be one image of each type per translation

language.description: two letter language code according to ISO 639-1 - every language code can only be used once per translation

preferred.description: flag indicating if language is default fallback language if no suitable language is found

enabled.description: flag indicating if doo settings are enabled

internalTitle.description: internal title of the product group

pauseAble.description: flag indicating if subscription is pause able

invoiceAddressMandatory.description: flag indicating if invoice address must be provided by the customer

deliveryAddressMandatory.description: flag indicating if delivery address must be provided by the customer

multiplePurchases.description: flag indicating if offer can be bought multiple times from the same customer

misuseRuleId.description: id of the misuse rule to apply

fixedStartDate.description: fixed date the offer starts with

issuesInPast.description: amount of issues that the user can select in the past - cannot be selected with fixed start date

issuesInFuture.description: amount of issues that the user can select in the future - cannot be selected with fixed start date

archived.description: flag indicating if offer is archived

allowedPaymentMethods.description: additional constraints to the payment methods if some of the selected payment methods cannot be used for this offer - there can be no more payment methods than selected in the global payment settings section

leafId.description: id of the tree leaf this offer should be associated with

externalBilling.description: indicates if payments are handled by plenigo or an external system

customerCancellationBlocked.description: indicates if a subscription cannot be cancelled by a customer

corporateAccountUsers.description: count of allowed corporate account users

bonusId.description: id of the bonus associated with this offer

selfServiceHintTmId.description: id of the text module used as self service hint

managedBy.description: managed by of the given offer.

pdfTemplateUsage.description: contains the pdf template to use with this offer

position.description: order position within the offer - must start with one and be in order

subscription.description: flag indicating if product represents a subscription

amount.description: amount of goods represented by this product

deliveryListId.description: id of the delivery list to use

validityTime.description: validity time of this product in days

validityEndTime.description: date the this product validity will be end

accessRightId.description: id of the access right associated with this product

costCenterId.description: id of the cost center associated with this product

ledgerId.description: id of the ledger associated with this product

ivwRuleId.description: id of the ivw rule associated with this product

voucherTargetPlenigoOfferId.description: plenigo offer id of the target offer - required with product type VOUCHER_SALE

voucherTemplateId.description: id of the voucher template to use - required with product type VOUCHER_SALE

voucherValidityTime.description: validity time of the voucher based on timespan

voucherValidityTimespan.description: date the this product validity will be end

additionalData.description: Key must be a string with a maximum length of 30 characters.

priceIssueId.description: id of the price issue associated with this product

shippingCostPriceIssueId.description: id of the shipping cost price issue associated with this product

creditCountWalledId.description: id of the credit card wallet associated with this credit count wallet

creditCount.description: credit count added with this product

option.description: flag indicating if product is an option in a basket

productContractId.description: id of the product contract associated with this step

additionalProductContractIds.description: additioanl product contract ids with this product

fromUserCount.description: from user count of the segment

priceIssueId.description: price issue id of the segment

toUserCount.description: to user count of the segment

priceIssueId.description: price issue id of the segment

multiuserBasicFeePriceIssueId.description: price issue id of the basic fee

pricePerUserSegments.description: array of price per user segments. (It is required if multiuserPaymentVariant is USER_BASED

graduatedPricePerUserSegments.description: array of graduated price per user segments. (It is required if multiuserPaymentVariant is USER_BASED_GRADUATED

durationPeriod.description: duration period of the product step - can be 0 for no end time

accountingPeriod.description: accounting period of the product step

cancellationPeriod.description: cancellation period of the product step

deliveries.description: amount of issues included in payment period

chargeableDeliveries.description: amount of paid issues included in payment period

cancellationPeriod.description: issue based cancellation period of the contract

cancellationPeriodTimespan.description: issue based cancellation timespan of the contract

autoRenewalDelivery.description: flag indicating if last step of an offer should be auto renewal

durationPeriod.description: duration period of the product step - can be 0 for no end time

accountingPeriod.description: accounting period of the product step

cancellationPeriod.description: cancellation period of the product step

leafId.description: id of the leaf the contract is related to

ivwRuleId.description: unique id of this ivw rule

priceIssueId.description: price issue to use (is only not required when it is a multiuser contract.

productContractId.description: unique id of the product contract within a contract company

archived.description: flag indicating if price country segment is archived

plenigoStepId.description: unique id of the step within the product

durationPeriod.description: duration period of the product step - can be 0 for no end time

accountingPeriod.description: accounting period of the product step

cancellationPeriod.description: cancellation period of the product step

productContractId.description: id of the product contract associated with this step

priceIssueId.description: id of the price issue associated with this step

ivwRuleId.description: id of the ivw rule associated with this product step

creditCount.description: credit count added with this step

additionalProductContracts.description: additioanl product contract ids with this product

plenigoProductId.description: unique id of the product within the offer

steps.description: steps associated with this product - mandatory field for subscriptions

internalTitle.description: internal title of the product group

plenigoProductGroupId.description: unique id of the product group within the offer

products.description: products associated with this product group

plenigoOfferId.description: unique id of the offer within a company

managedExternal.description: flag indicating if offer is managed externally

productGroups.description: product groups associated with this offer

leafId.description: id of the tree leaf this price issue should be associated with

description.description: Internal description of the price issue

currency.description: currency of the order formatted as ISO 4217, alphabetic code

validFrom.description: date price segment is valid from in full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

validFromExistingSubscription.description: date price segment is valid for exisiting subscriptions from in full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

worldSegment.description: flag indicating if price is valid for the complete world if no other price segments are provided - must be set if price country segment id is not provided

title.description: title of the price country segment

priority.description: priority of the price country segment - the lower the priority the higher the rank of the price segment

description.description: internal description of the price country segment

countries.description: array of country codes formatted as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

priceCountrySegmentId.description: unique id of the price country segment within a contract company

priceSegmentId.description: unique id of the price segment within a contract company

priceIssueId.description: unique id of the price issue within a contract company

archived.description: flag indicating if price country segment is archived

changeDate.description: date the refund was changed with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

refundId.description: unique id of the refund also used for pagination

customerId.description: unique id of the customer the refund is related to

currency.description: currency of the refund formatted as ISO 4217, alphabetic code

paymentProvider.description: payment provider used for refund execution

cancellationInvoiceId.description: unique id of the cancellation also used for pagination

transactionId.description: unique id of the transaction also used for pagination

pspTransactionId.description: id of the payment service provider if one was provided

language.description: two letter language code according to ISO 639-1 - every language code can only be used once per translation

text.description: text to show to the customer

preferred.description: flag indicating if language is preferred

internalTitle.description: internal title of the cancellation reason

active.description: flag indicating if cancellation reason is currently active

translations.description: translations associated with this cancellation reason

uniqueId.description: unique id to associate with the user after user has accepted cancellation reason

customerCancellationReasonId.description: unique id of the customer cancellation reason

archived.description: flag indicating if customer cancellation reason is archived

data.description: Key must be a string with a maximum length of 30 characters.

id.description: unique id of the voucher in the context of a company

orderId.description: order id this voucher was used

campaignId.description: unique id of the campaign in the context of a company

voucherType.description: represents the type of the vouchers of this campaign

plenigoOfferId.description: offer id the vouchers are for

startDate.description: start date of the campaign with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

endDate.description: end date of the campaign with full-date notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21

channelId.description: unique id of the channel in the context of a company

voucherAmount.description: represents the amount of vouchers for this channel

id.description: unique id of the multi voucher in the context of a company

voucherAmount.description: amount how often the voucher code can be used

voucherUsed.description: amount of how often the voucher code is already used

customerId.description: id of the customer the credit usage should be accounted to

uniqueId.description: unique id of the wallet to use

uploadDate.description: date the upload was done with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

creditUploadId.description: unique id of the credit upload also used for pagination

itemType.description: type of this access right item

itemId.description: the id this access right belongs to

customerId.description: id of the customer the credit usage should be accounted to

uniqueId.description: unique id of the wallet to use

usageDate.description: date the usage was done with date-time notation as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6, for example, 2017-07-21T17:32:28Z

creditUsageId.description: unique id of the credit usage also used for pagination
